titleInfo.title: Second New Orleans District, Corps of Engineers, U.S. Army, Wooden revetment at Hayes Canal, Mississippi River, 1939 January 12.

mods.note: Caption title. Wooden revetment at Hayes Canal under contract to Eugene deArmas, contract no.W1096-eng.-6127. View downstream showing completed revetment and finished levee. Station 2080."No.2618."
